name: HELLO  RANGE / HELL O RANGE / HELL  ORANGE
description: Ok, so I lied. How could I not do more of these? BLGs are so much fun to discover and bring to the light of day; like using that one "Lemon Zest" or "Poppy Red" color you haven't use on your palette for awhile. In this work, when we make use the words HELLO & RANGE, we can share the "O" between the two and transition between HELLO RANGE to HELL ORANGE. One of the benefits of have a sequential background in gradient form is that I start to play off the background color and think about what would integrate best with it at that particular moment. I helps keep the mind fresh and the creativity at peak performance. I hate looking at a blank white page.
